tag.description: Performs non-critical validations after invoke-application, to output warning messages and set style.

attribute.name: ignoreNullOrBlank
attribute.description: By default null or blank values will be ignored.

attribute.name: validator
attribute.description: The validator that should be executed, must implement WarningValidator or JSF Validator.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Inline style to be displayed on failure.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: StlyeClass to be applied in case of failure.

attribute.name: infoClass
attribute.description: StyleClass to be applied in case of Severity.SEVERITY_INFO , will override styleClass.

attribute.name: warnClass
attribute.description: StyleClass to be applied in case of Severity.SEVERITY_WARN level, will override styleClass.

attribute.name: errorClass
attribute.description: StyleClass to be applied in case of Severity.SEVERITY_ERROR level, will override styleClass.

attribute.name: fatalClass
attribute.description: StyleClass to be applied in case of Severity.SEVERITY_FATAL level, will override styleClass.
